name: backroom ripoff
description:
Notes

==================================

There is only level 0, so there is no escape

Instructions

==================================

WASD to move

Look with Mouse

Put volume 40% for good experience

When your Screen gets Vignette, The entity is near

to restart the game, reload your entire tab cuz me was too lazy to add respawn

enjoy getting mauled by your biggest nightmare, Bye!
